jd: From: Rajeev, Vyzeinc rajeev@vyzeinc.com Reply to: rajeev@vyzeinc.com Job Title: Python developer Duraation:6+ Month Location: Midtown Manhattan City, NYMode of Interview: 1 round is video ,1 to round onsite Need DL copy and Linkedin Id Python developer with investment banking experience, will require onsite interview and tech test.1.Understanding key business requirements2. Reactivity and autonomy Regards, Rajeev | Vyze Inc.25179 Methley Plum Place, Aldie, VA 20105 Email: rajeev@vyzeinc.com
